questions.questionText: In Angular, you can pass data from parent component to child component using ...
questions.explantations: @Input() lets a parent component update data in the child component.

questions.questionText: What is a component in Angular?

options.text: A building block of the application

questions.explantations: Building Blocks are the components that you use as an application developer to build enterprise apps.

questions.questionText: What are the key features of Angular?
questions.explantations: Development of single-page applications,Component-based architecture and Two-way data link are all the key features of Angular?

questions.questionText: What is data binding in Angular?

options.text: Establish a connection between the component and the DOM

questions.explantations: (DOM) is the data representation of the objects that comprise the structure and content of a document on the web.

questions.questionText: What is the default embedded web server in Spring Boot?
questions.explantations: It is the most popular servlet container which was used to deploy java applications, by default spring boot is built the standalone application which was running on the desktop.

questions.questionText: How to set a Spring Boot dependency in a Maven project

options.text: By adding the dependency in the `pom.xml` file
By adding the dependency in the `build.gradle` file.
By importing the dependency directly into the source code.

questions.explantations: A Project Object Model or POM is the fundamental unit of work in Maven. It is an XML file that contains information about the project and configuration .

questions.questionText: What is the recommended way to customize configuration in a Spring Boot application?

options.text: Directly modify the configuration files in the deployment directory.
Use external properties files or YAML files.
Modify the source code of the application.

questions.explantations: YAML is a human-readable data serialization language that is often used for writing configuration files

questions.questionText: What is the main functionality provided by Spring Boot?
questions.explantations: pring Boot auto-configuration attempts to automatically configure your Spring application based on the jar dependencies that you have added.
